thread.title: New Zealand OGP Draft Self-Assessment Report now available
thread.title_full: New Zealand OGP Draft Self-Assessment Report now available

title: New Zealand OGP Draft Self-Assessment Report now available
text:
New Zealand OGP Draft Self-Assessment Report now available Monday, 12 October 2015, 5:18 pm Press Release: Transparency International 
New Zealand OGP Draft Self-Assessment Report now available, Comments Accepted through 16 October 
The state services commission has produced a draft OGP self-assessment report for review. They are accepting comments until 16 October. View and comment on their website . 
From the State Services Commission 
"As a result of the input we have extended the opportunity for feedback and have released a draft discussion document for review and input prior to finalisation and submission to the international OGP Secretariat later in October. 
You may have already seen the draft mid-term self-assessment report that is available at: https://www.ssc.govt.nz/open-government-partnership#mid-term-self-assessment 
Further feedback on the draft is very welcome. 
We would appreciate it if you could please notify your networks, and would be delighted if you could submit any relevant comments to this email address on or before 16 October, 2015, for review.
